div.h4: WEBB CISD is closely monitoring the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) and is in contact with the City of Laredo Health Department to ensure all students and staff members are safe and updated with the latest information from the Center for Disease Control, Texas Health and Human Services, and Texas Education Agency. During these evolving times, we hope you are taking care of yourselves and that our students and families have access to resources and support as needed.
WEBB CISD Grab and Go Meals

Since March 23rd, drive-through food distribution continues to be offered at school sites across the district. Meal kits will be provided to any student 18 years old and younger. Each meal kit will include breakfast and lunch and will be distributed at the front parking area of each school site on a drive-through basis.

div.class: elementor-element elementor-element-351c5c5 elementor-arrows-position-inside elementor-pagination-position-outside elementor-widget elementor-widget-image-carousel

img.figcaption: WEBB CISD Staff providing Grab and Go meals to students

div.h2:
During these evolving times, we hope you are taking care of yourselves and that our students and families have access to resources and supports as needed. This is a time of great uncertainty for all of us and we know you have a lot of questions.
WEBB CISD is monitoring new information from state and local officials. Due to Governor Greg Abbott issuing an Executive Order implementing Essential Services and Activities Protocols, we are now closed until further notice. The return date is subject to change depending on what our local, state and federal officials are recommending. During this closure, we will continue our food distribution program at
WEBB CISD locations.
We are also currently printing our paper academic packets that parents will be able to pick up at our food distribution locations. We recognize that you are trying to make plans for your family and ask for your understanding as we face this unprecedented situation together. We truly appreciate and thank you for your patience.

div.span: WEBB CISD has suspended normal school operations until further notice.

p.a: Centers of Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

div.h4: WEBB CISD is currently preparing instructional materials and technology equipment for the continuation of instruction at home.

div.p: Student Focused, Data driven, Results orientated

It is the policy of Webb C.I.S.D. not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, or handicap in its programs, services, or activities as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended

Webb C.I.S.D is an Equal Opportunity Employer that considers applicants for all positions, without regard to race, color, national origin, age, religion, sex, martial or veteran status, the presence of medical condition, disability, or any other legally protected status.
